string.b: The biggest retro game store in Bangkok, now open!

resources.string: We might have the one that suits your appetite, drop by and feel free to have a look!
Offering services for retro/vintage consoles, by retro gamers.

string.name: rr_joinwelcome
string.b: Join today to receive your RETRO RUMBLE benefits!

resources.string: By signing up, it is unanimous that you have acknowledged and agreed to RETRO RUMBLE privacy policy and agreed to RETRO RUMBLE terms of agreement.
I agree to RETRO RUMBLE privacy policy and RETRO RUMBLE terms of agreement (Published 10th May, 2027).
©2027 RETRO RUMBLE, a subsidiary of 4D inc. All Rights Reserved.
SNK NEO-GEO AES Video Game System

SNK NEO-GEO AES is a video game console manufactured by SNK in 1990s, aimed to bring Arcade Titles to the comfort of your home. With a continuity feature of bringing your own save file from your AES console to the MVS Arcade Machine and vice versa, it is considered by many to be a console that is ahead of its time.
After submitting your request, RETRO RUMBLE representative will attempt to contact you by E-mail, please provide all the necessary details so RETRO RUMBLE can assist you as much as we can.

SEGA Dreamcast is the last time we have seen SEGA in the video game console space, directly competing with Sony PlayStation 2 and Nintendo Gamecube, the sales were not great and SEGA finally conceded, leaving the console war entirely. That being said, SEGA has a wide selection of games that everyone can also enjoy.

Sony PLAYSTATION 3 launched in 2006 and became a part of the 7th generation of consoles, this particular model is the launch model, meaning that it is backwards compatible with PlayStation 2 games, while all the PlayStation 3 is backwards compatible with PlayStation 1 games, only a handful of revisions are PlayStation 2 backwards compatible, sold in 20GB (CECH-B0x) and 60GB (CECH-Axx) variant.

4D group is a privately owned company originated in Bangkok, Thailand by 4 members, operated under the philosophy of bringing people together and eliminating the barriers of speaking the truth. The company currently held the title of the most favorable company in the world (as of 2027) and the fastest growing company in terms of revenue growth (as of 2028).
Currently, 4D consists of 4 members, with various business in entertainment, music, gaming, and social responsibility.

Members of the 4D group has been involved in many acts of being bullied in high school, which sparked a common interest among them to form a group called 4D, they stated that it was a tough time and decided that they would stay together and continue working together as a team to change the world, so that no one would have to deal with the issues they have been through. As of 2026, the member launched a campaign known as “4D Academy” to help build a platform for teenagers who have been dealing with bullying issues, and various social issues, which became very successful and impacted a wide variety of communities. After 6 months since the launch of the campaign, 4D members established 4D inc. A private company which will took over the project operation of both 4D Academy and RETRO RUMBLE which launched in the same year as 4D Academy.
